content: readme.md react-native-roxieconnect music library the devices around .purpose it's enough just listen your music, need experience . connect favorite tunes a smart light enjoy show. using arduino, control irrigation system watch dance. you need is song mind a bluetooth device. it worksroxie analyzes meter level a song, assigns a value, emits payload the bluetooth connected device. to customize made easy you connect customize a qr code:steps:discover bluetooth device's peripheralid, characteristicuuid, serviceuuiddecide values want write your devicefill the below json object your values: { "peripheralid": "dca3c1f9-3ba2-4a2a-8107-88bf3b7c0de0", "characteristicuuid": "ffe1", "serviceuuid": "ffe0", "values": [ "0", "1", "2", "3" ] } sure stringify json objectconvert to qr codeclick connect scan qr codeshare qr code others. send a pr!supported deviceshm-10 bleqr codeshm-10 ble { "peripheralid": "dca3c1f9-3ba2-4a2a-8107-88bf3b7c0de0", "characteristicuuid": "ffe1", "serviceuuid": "ffe0", "values": [ "0", "1", "2", "3" ] }installationgit clonenpm installreact-native linktesting linting use jest testing eslint linting. npm test
